install.description: On The Fly Content Optimizer, to solve wasted, and redundant badwidth.

param.name: image_quality
param.label: Quality
param.description: Quality is optional, and ranges from 0 (worst quality, smaller file) to 100 (best quality, biggest file). The default is the default IJG quality value (about 75).

param.name: image_support_gif
param.label: Optimize GIF Images
param.description: GD dosent support resizing animated GIF images. If you have animated GIF images, you have to set this to No, to keep the animation.

param.name: image_upsampling
param.label: Upsample images
param.description: Makes images that are stretched looks nicer in some browsers, but requires more bandwith to send them

param.name: image_resample_same_dimensions
param.label: Resample same dimensions
param.description: Resamples images that the same size.
param.option: No (Ignore them if they are the same pixle dimensions)
Yes (Image Quality is used, saving bandwith)

param.name: image_force_smaller_file
param.label: Force smaller image
param.description: If failed to create a smaler image then use the orignal.

param.name: debug
param.label: Debug
param.description: Enables debuging. You will also have to enable 'Error Reporting' in PHP and\or Joomla! (In J1.5 Site Menu > Global Configuration > Server > Server Settings > Error Reporting)
